Did you know that Roblox mobile app is available in 60 countries and the US is only 22% of the downloads (174M) but the US accounts for 59% of the revenues ($2B).  The revenue per download in the US is $11 vs. $4 globally.
Roblox mobile‚Äôs global lifetime rev is $3.3B and downloads are $800M.  The power of UGC.
